name: Adventures of Sputnik
description:
Adventures of Sputnik

Adventures of Sputnik is a game i worked on with a fellow student, It was our submission for the Sputnik Jam in October 2017.

In this game you pilot Sputnik through an asteroid field, dodging asteroids and collecting energy.

Programmer - Elliot Chester    https://twitter.com/chester_elliot
Artist - Charlie Kinglake    https://twitter.com/CharlieKinglake
